Hedging strategies: The peculiar thing about forex trading is that you do not have end up being 100% correct about your future price predictions. It is certain about certain matters and still profit. As an if you’re sure that the Pound Sterling will perform better compared to the US Dollar, you may go long relating to the pound and short the dollar and net the net income. It doesn’t matter if prices rise or fall providing that the pound fares compared to the cent. This strategy is called hedging. Don’t need to even certain about foreseeable future. There are mathematical correlations support you conduct these trades and if done in huge numbers the correlations hold .
